name: You Are The Helmet
description:
You ARE the helmet!

A = Left

D = Right

R = Retry

(Made within 48 hours)

Concept: You know when Pippin knocks the helmet down the well in Lord Of The Rings? 

Well what if YOU WERE THAT HELMET?! 

You have to try and alert as many orcs as you can as you crash your way down!

(Or each the bottom in record time!)

Credits:

Orc sprite: https://opengameart.org/content/animated-orcs

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/16-bit-music-pack-1

Everything else: Heiach
